dct_title_s: Udsigt af Forbieget Mesurado. og Egnene deromkring Udaf Marchais
dct_alternative_sm: En Anden Udsigt af Forbierget Mesurado. tagen af Barbot
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially and depths by bathymetric soundings.
Bird's-eye view at top; panoramic view at bottom.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Main title at top left; other title in decorative banner.
Shows coastline, topography, drainage, vegetation, anchoring points (indicated with anchor icons).
Appears in Prévost's L'Histoire generale des voyages.
